name: Dungeon Pixel Art
description:
Help Farr escape from the dungeon, he has a big hammer and a hook. Any enemy will die with one blow of the hammer, but there are too many enemies, can you handle it?

Your hero is an excellent dungeon hunter. Mr. Farr loves two things: crushing enemies and looting gold.

The main charactser can deliver super hammer blows, pull the enemy with a hook, make a quick dash and much more. You can also buy artifacts that allow you to get passive skills. Thanks to the purchase of artifacts, gold, and skill upgrades, there is an RPG element in the game. Mr. Farr will have to face magic, traps, the power of various enemies and RB.

In the game you will find:

-Dozens of enemies

-Unique enemy skills

-Lots of Raid Bosses

-Opportunities for upgrading characteristics

-5 basic cards

-10 artifacts

-Quests with rewards for killing opponents.

List of artifacts:

- Collect coins

- Second Life

- Second energy

- Summon ball lightning

- Double Damage

- Bonus gold

- Super dash

- Curse of death - kills all enemies behind

- Attraction HP and energy bottles.

This is an offline pixel art-style platformer game in which the main goal is to earn coins to upgrade your character and buy new locations. Leave feedback and new maps will be available soon. Good game.
